section.title: The Data Sets View
section.para: The Data Sets View is in the lower right-hand corner of the Functional Test Specification Perspective by default. It lets you add, modify, delete and see any data for Test Cases. For each Test Case containing references or for each central test data set, you can add data sets in this view. This is also the view where you can translate your data and overwrite data when you reuse a Test Case. When data in the Data Sets View are uneditable, they are shown in gray. Values in black may be edited.
To make entering data easier, pressing »ENTER« will spring to the next cell or row, or to the ”Add” button if no more rows have been added. The »Tab« key springs to the ”Add” button.
